coreAttributes.name: war axe
coreAttributes.description: This sharpened war axe has a simple wooden hilt with wraps of leather. The head is made out of ethereal arcane energy, which, instead of cutting someone, drains their energy as it passes through them.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Hack at [npc2.name] with your war axe.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] war axe at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(sheath)] [npc.her] war axe, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(hack)] [npc.her] war axe at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] war axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(hack)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] war axe, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!
